property.name: Outfit
property.value: Law Dogs

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Law Dog Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Law Dog Dude in this location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Maze Rats

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Maze Rat Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Maze Rat Dude in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Gadget. Can only be attached to a Collegium Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Collegium Dude in this location. When bringing this Gadget into play, it can be attached to Dudes other than Mad Scientists, and does not require a skill check.

property.name: Text
property.value: Mad Scientist. Weapon. Gadget Difficulty: 5. If this Dude is Aced in a shootout, pull: If the pull is odd, the Flamethrower explodes, Acing two additional Dudes of your choice in your posse. Shootout: Pay 1 Ghost Rock. This Dude gains a +2 Bullet bonus and is a Stud until the end of the shootout. This action can be used once per shootout.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Texas Ranger Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Texas Ranger Dude in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Sweetrock Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Sweetrock Dude in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Shootout: Target a booted Dude in the opposing posse. Until the shootout ends, the target cannot be the shooter if another Dude can be, and the target's Bullet rating does not contribute to the number of cards Drawn or redrawn by the opposing player.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Black Jack Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Black Jack Dude in this location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Sioux Union Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Texas Ranger Dude in this location.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Sioux Union

property.name: Text
property.value: Reaction: Instead of receiving your home's Production during Upkeep, you can get any one Spirit or Sioux Dude from your deck, show it to the other players, then put it into your Play hand. If you borrowed from the Bank during the Gambling Phase, you must be able to repay that Ghost Rock in order to use this action.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: The Agency

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to an Agency Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Agency Dude in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Unique. Weapon. Can only be attached to a Whateley Dude. This Dude gains +1 Bullet bonus and a +1 Influence bonus for every other Whateley Dude in this location.

property.name: Text
property.value: Horse. Reaction: Boot the Roan instead of this Dude when riding to a new location. You cannot move a booted Dude in this fashion.

property.name: Outfit
property.value: Texas Rangers

property.name: Text
property.value: Noon: Target a Terror. Boot one of your Dudes in the same or adjacent location to call out the Terror. Reaction: Immediately before one of your Dudes moves or joins a posse, boot this card. The Dude can ignore all movement restrictions, and can join a posse at a non-adjacent location. All movement costs, such as booting, must still be paid.
